text: Koraa, â€˜ma'i tomalokaka e'ibora bastutakai utkrsta kono bastura sambada dima neki? Yisakale takbaraa aralambana karae te'omlokara babe te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata ache jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita haya, tata te'omloka sthayi haâ€™ba; arau ache paraitra straisakala lagate allahara taraphara paraa santusti; arau allaha bandasakalara bisaye samyaka drasta
